description:
So nice to finally have a GUI to manage JACK that also is capable of easily bridging the inputs and outputs of other connected non-JACK audio interfaces into the JACK world in a way that actually makes sense. Kudos on the button to launch Carla

It's not perfect and there are a few rough edges, but this is an amazing tool and I'm looking forward to future updates! If you add a patchbay tool I would be super happy and could finally ditch qjackctl 
(aj-snapshot would be perfect!)
It keeps hijacking the input and output with that jack sink thingy. I don't see the use of it.

Can't install it for the above reason; oddly enough, once I had run the Ubuntu Studio Installer, 'Controls' actually appeared but as soon as I did a restart it vanished and I now get the 'unmet dependencies' message.

Professional audio can't use pulseaudio due to latency.
Jack replaces it. This starts it automatically.
summary: Ubuntu studio includes an automatic Jack controller

description: Tiene buenas herramientas, y hasta ahora me a funcionado muy bien.
SOLUCIONA ERROR MICROFONO EN AUDIENT ID14 + JACK, EXCELENTE
